snippet: One change in the music awards allows use of sampling and “interpolation” in all songwriting categories; another redefines “alternative.”
abstract: National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences announces handful of tweaks for Grammy Award categories, most significantly one that widens field for songs that use sampling.
lead_paragraph: One change in the music awards allows use of sampling and “interpolation” in all songwriting categories; another redefines “alternative.”

headline.main: Award Categories for Grammys Are Tweaked
headline.print_headline: Grammy Widens Field for Songs With Sampling
